ygData.subject: Re: Sounds of War (Explosions and blood-curdling screams)
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Read down the whole thing, remember my new strategy for posting on these huge posts. ... Doom ... back ... anyone ... OOC: It s okay, but what strategy

OOC: Read down the whole thing, remember my new strategy for posting on
these huge posts.

> (Firing at the pelvis has its own unique strategy, and sorry about the
Doom
> Ice mix up, I put it down the first time as Doom Ice, then when I looked
back
> at it to make sure, I thought it was Ice Doom...crazy me.  Oh, and if
anyone
> is wondering, I'm leaving Nemesis Enforcer and Scattershot out for now
> because I'm waiting for Alloran to reply)

OOC: It's okay, but what strategy does pelvis shooting do?

>Serpentor/Punch/Unitron/Sixshot/Ares/Chaos/Minion/Demon >Wulf/Flesh
> Ripper/Dark Claw/The Oblitercons:
>
>
>
> Unitron's right side seared with pain from Stronghold's missile, and
> Unitron's mind was racing with evil thoughts of vengance.  Swerving the
> cannon to face Stronghold (Uni is currently a tank), he fired off a blast
of
> energy.

Stronghold fires against the shots, no avail, he is burnt by the energy
blast. He fires back 1 single shot at Unitron.

> Serpentor catches the lightning blast in his back, sending him sprawling
> backwards.
>
> -------
>
> Punch continues having the autoguns firing upon the Mafia.

OOC: The Mafia are 5 guys, but I'll take it as the autoguns were firing at
all of Shokaract's group, okay?

BIC: Deemos is struck in the back of the head by autogun fire.

"I think it's time to retreat, this attack isn't working, there are too many
of them. And they have the advantage of having a base do their fighting."
Shokaract says.

"I agree, we took 2 of them down anyway and got a little damage on the base,
let's get fixed up and come back." Deemos says.

"Attention, we are now going to retreat to get repaired, let's move!"
Shokaract was talking to his group.

> Demon Wulf, taking a step forward, is hit in the chest mid-step, falling
back
> a few feet.  Re-establishing a good stance, Demon Wulf fired off three
optic
> blasts at Gigas' abdomen.

Gigas was truck all 3 times but stood still. He was about to fire back when
he heard the retreat call and retreated.

> Dark Claw raised a hand, Shockaract's blasts striking him the side, Dark
Claw
> getting down to one knee for support, firing off a blue blast of energy
from
> his left palm at Shockaract.

Shokaract dodges and goes retreating, launching a grenade at the Alliance
base as he retreated.

> Flesh Ripper lets the blasts knocking him back a few feet, taking quick
aim,
> seeing the small skirmish between Serge and Burning Hammer, and Serge
ending
> up on both knees.  "Ha." Flesh Ripper said without emotion, firing off
four
> blasts from his rifle at Serge's chest.

Serge is struck hard and goes into stasis lock. Shokaract transforms into
tank mode as he runs and grappling hooks Serge. He takes Serge with him.
Burning Hammer looks to Flesh Ripper to see where the blasts came from.

> Chaos transformed to robot mode.  "I've got to save my missiles for when
they
> are really needed." he said quickly, an automatic rifle appearing in his
> hands.  He fired off 20 shells at the downed Rizopas.

Rizopas gets up and runs as 12 the shells strike him. He hears the retreat
order. He fires one last shot at Chaos before running.

> Minion yells out as he jumps backwards, the explosion sending him
flipping,
> slamming to the ground hard, Minion slowly got up, looking around to try
and
> clear his thoughts.
>
> ---
>
> Dark One pulled up, loading two more missiles, getting ready to make a
second
> pass.
>
> ---
>
> Pyro took aim with his cannon (he's also currently a tank), firing off
three
> more fireballs at Diskus' torso.

Diskus is struck but is in stasis lock, he never felt it. And the worst part
was, that the Chosen Ones and the Mafia left him behind in their retreat.

> Hiss, the only Oblitercon not in his alternate mode, fell to his back from
> Shockaract's return fire.  On his back, Hiss returned fire with a single
> fusion blast at Shockaract.

Shokaract dodges as he runs, not bothering to fire back.

> Breakdown (now a cannon/artillery), fired off a mortar shell at Doom Ice.

Doom Ice dodges it and hears the retreat order. She groans at the thought of
retreating and relunctently runs.

> Scavenger transforms to his HUMVEE (I've become uncertain about the
spelling
> recently) mode, not wanting to play the speed game.  Going into reverse,
the
> two machine guns, one mounted on both sides, fired twenty rounds off each,
a
> twenty of forty rounds heading straight for Blender's legs, Scavenger
going
> into reverse.

At this point my mail with Feline's attack comes into place...

> Sixshot sees Gigas fall down, and the STAG transforms into his
wolf-creature
> mode (wolf with wings), and dives, his four inch claws outstretched and
> pointed at Gigas' back.  "Have fun in the great junkyard in the sky!"

Gigas swipes a knife at STAG as he rolls backwards. He sees an opening and
retreats.

> Ares yells out in anger.  "STUPID IDIOT!  YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO DIE!" he
> screams as anger that had been built up since Unitron crippled the
Newcomers
> was let out, Ares driving in his tank mode straight for Grenade.
>
> Targeting with his weapons, he fired off a total of nine laser blasts
(three
> from three cannons) at Grenade.

Grenade fires 3 fireballs at Ares as Ares' shots hit him. He flies into the
sky and starts to retreat with the rest...

>
>
>
